casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Cory Dion BENNETT 406PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2019 Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Attorney at Law, Asheboro, for Bennett, Cory Dion. Brent Kiziah, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Donald H. Beskind, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Fred T. Korematsu Center for Law and Equality. David Weiss, Attorney at Law, for Coalition of State and National Criminal Justice and Civil Rights Advocates. James E. Coleman, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Coalition of State and National Criminal Justice and Civil Rights Advocates. Elizabeth Hambourger, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Coalition of State and National Criminal Justice and Civil Rights Advocates. Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 11th of July 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of July 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 28th day of August 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
